backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing website content, user profiles, inquiries, photos, FAQ items, and admin password with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing a modification to swap displayed founder names in FoundersSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files used as reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global border/background application.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root, home, and admin routes wrapped in a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, success/error state handling, and inquiry submission via React Query.
frontend/src/components/FaqAccordion.tsx: Static FAQ accordion listing eight common questions using shadcn accordion components.
Renders three founder cards with swapped names for Saloni and Sumit, loading photos from backend with fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/PricingCards.tsx: Renders pricing plan cards with features and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
Displays program level cards and a shared-features card with lists of skills and benefits.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Provides a footer with branding, navigation shortcuts, contact links, and dynamic YouTube URL.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with navigation, mobile menu, and YouTube link using scroll-to-section logic.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Exports shared constants for public contact email and phone.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPassword.ts: Defines hooks for checking, setting, verifying, and resetting the admin password via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages persisted admin authentication state using Zustand.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and helpers for login state, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhotos.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, fetch, add, update, and delete photos through the backend actor, with cache invalidation and upload progress support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching inquiries, checking admin status, and submitting new inquiries using the backend actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebsiteContent.ts: Offers hooks to fetch and update website content via the backend actor with React Query cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and utility classes for layout and styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard with password management, inquiry viewing, photo management, and website content editing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the public homepage including hero content, features, program sections, pricing, FAQs, and contact form using dynamic content and photos.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color system, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, existing features, and a pending request to swap two displayed team member names.
